item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Terminology Minikube: Minikube is a tool that sets up a single-node cluster thatâ€™s great for both testing Kubernetes and developing apps locally. Kubelet: Master Node: The master node, which hosts the Kubernetes Control Plane that controls and manages the whole Kubernetes system. Node: Worker nodes that run the actual applications you deploy. Pod: Running containers in Kubernetes. Service: Enabling clients to discover and talk to pods. Commands General Commands # Starting a Minikube virtual machine.
